job.title: Technical consultant (senior engineer c# / dev ops / cto / architecture)
job.description:
Seeking a strong, experienced technical advisor to provide strategic guidance and technical expertise in system design, .net stack (C#, MS SQL) database and backup, VPS and network setup and related areas.

The ideal candidate will serve as a trusted technical advisor assisting our team in making informed decisions on tech architecture, scalability, performance, security, technical code review on an ad-hoc consultancy basis.

Areas of expertise:

1. Extensive C# experience - to provide guidance on C# code / coding standards, best practices. 

2. Database strategy - guidance on database setup, backups, replication 

3. System design consultation - on scalability, performance security and maintainability


You must have extensive experience in system design, c# development, sql db managemnet. Proven track record of providing technical consultancy in a freelance capability. strong understanding of system architecture, networking principles, vps / cloud tech.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are in need of a technical consultant with expertise in senior engineering, C#, DevOps, CTO, and architecture. The project is expected to last for 1 to 3 months. 

As a technical consultant, your primary responsibility will be to assist us in designing and implementing software solutions. We require proficiency in Microsoft SQL Server, software architecture and design, DevOps, and C#. 

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. Please describe your past experience and provide links to any relevant completed projects. We are particularly interested in candidates who have successfully worked on similar projects in the past.

We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing the project in further detail.
